alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 7:18PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Fairfield, New Haven and Putnam Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 717 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Wingdale to near New Fairfield to Mahopac. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sherman and New Fairfield around 725 PM EDT. Danbury and Bethel around 730 PM EDT. Newtown and Ridgefield around 735 PM EDT. Monroe and Redding around 745 PM EDT. Southbury and Middlebury around 750 PM EDT. Waterbury and Naugatuck around 755 PM EDT. Milford and Wallingford around 800 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Southern New Haven
